## AspectContext.getArgs() method

Get the current arguments (may have been modified by previous aspects). Returns a reference to the mutable arguments array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getArgs(): any[];
```
**Returns:**

any\[\]

Current arguments array

## Example


```typescript
const args = context.getArgs();
args[0] = 'modified'; // Modifies the actual arguments
```
